line.text: %WEASEL%: Hey, look, you don't know me but the name's Weasel. I was given that laptop you found on the helicarrier, and boy, have I got news for you.
%WEASEL%: The laptop is definitely Black Widow's and it holds information on a S.H.I.E.L.D. think tank called The Imperium.

response.text: %PLAYER%: So Black Widow might have been trying to give secret information to Doom?

line.text: %WEASEL%: Maybe. But we need to find out what The Imperium does. And for that you have to get a S.H.I.E.L.D. security module for me. I think The Vision might have one.
%WEASEL%: You gave me the wrong name. I went to meet Beroge and a bunch of S.H.I.E.L.D. agents were waiting for me. I had to jump out a window to get away.

response.text: %PLAYER%: So you can't get back into the S.H.I.E.L.D. database?

line.text: %WEASEL%: Of course I can. I looked up the other hacker, C.B. Cebulski, and he told me all I need is a S.H.I.E.L.D. security module. Go talk to The Vision - I bet he has one.
%WEASEL%: Hey, that name you gave me, C.B. Cebulski, was perfect.

response.text: %PLAYER%: He was able to help you?

line.text: %WEASEL%: Yeah, he said all I'd need was a S.H.I.E.L.D. security module. Would you mind talking to The Vision? I bet he has one.
